reason: Duplicate answer. Answer is identical to q_4_0561 (same source, same content). Question is a trivial rephrase of q_4_0561.
Duplicate answer with q_4_0561. Also, question is awkwardly phrased: '정의를 하려면 어떤 요건이 필요한가요' (what requirements to perform a definition?) is nonsensical - one does not 'perform' a definition.
Duplicate answer with q_4_0561. Question asks about 구분(classification) of the definition, but there is only one definition. Answer is identical to q_4_0561/0562/0563.
Duplicate answer with q_4_0561. Question asks 어떤 종류가 있나요(what types exist) about a definition, which is nonsensical - the definition does not have 'types'. Same answer as q_4_0561/0562/0563/0565.
Source text verified on page 287 section 3. Answer correctly covers 가(비밀누설금지) and 나(품위유지) which are the 준수사항 items present on the cited page.
Question-source mismatch. Question asks about 판례(court precedents) or 사례(cases) which do not exist on page 287. Answer ignores the question and dumps 준수사항 source text without any 판례 or 사례.
Grammatically broken question. '비공개 직무정보가 공개되지 않도록이 제한되는 경우' has incorrect particle usage (이 after 않도록). Question is poorly formed and does not make clear grammatical sense.

Question-source mismatch. Question asks about 학교 행정실(school admin office) duties, which is not mentioned anywhere on page 287. Answer ignores the question and dumps 지침의 목적 및 적용 text. Also duplicate answer with q_4_0553.

Question-source mismatch. Question asks about 자주 혼동되는 부분(commonly confused parts), a subjective meta-question not addressed by the source. Answer ignores the question and dumps same 지침의 목적 및 적용 text. Duplicate answer with q_4_0553/0577.

Question-source mismatch. Question asks about practical 업무 처리 방법(how to process related work) at school, which is not in the source. Answer ignores the question and dumps same 지침의 목적 및 적용 text. Duplicate answer with q_4_0553/0577/0578.
